geolocation_not_found: Your browser does not support localization
geolocation_not_permitted: Localization could not be retrieved. Please check your browser settings.
form_preview: Please check the preview of the entry on the map before submit.
form_agreement: I have read the privacy policy and accept it.
form_error: The form could not be processed
form_error_location: Please select a position on the map first
form_failure_success_title: Thank you for your error report
form_failure_success_desc: We will process your submission as soon as possible
form_add_success_desc: We will publish the entry as soon as it has been verified.
form_name: Name or Description of the location
form_add_position: Set the location of the toilet by clicking on the map.
form_toilet_notexist: Toilet does not exist ( any more )
zoom_closer: Zoom closer to obtain a list of toilets.
add_note_desc:
Please register only public toilets. No private rooms, restaurants, shops, hospitals, etc.
Exceptions are facilities expressly approved by the owner. Thank you very much for your cooperation!
add_zoom_closer: Zoom in closer to add an entry
pwa_installed: This website now also works offline!
offline_function: This function is not possible offline.
offline_entries_request: New entries could not be loaded
offline_page_request: Page information could not be loaded
offline_form: Forms cannot be processed offline. Please make sure you have an active Internet connection.
feedback_description: Found an error? Any suggestions for improving the WC-Guide or just a nice feedback? Thank you very much! We are looking forward to any feedback.
feedback_browserdata: I agree that some technical data about my device will be sent along with the feedback. This data is completely anonymous and does not lead to any personal information about me, but helps to solve problems.
cookiebanner: This website uses cookies to provide you with an optimal experience. By continuing to use the website, you agree to the use of cookies.
browser_error: Your web browser is outdated. Update your browser for more security, speed and convenience on this site.
